title: 2009 Australian Grand Prix
summary: The 2009 Australian Grand Prix (formally the 2009 Formula 1 ING Australian Grand Prix)[3] was a Formula One motor race held on 29 March 2009 at the Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit, Melbourne, Australia. It was the firstÂ race of the 2009 Formula One season. The 58-lap race was won by Jenson Button for the Brawn GP team after starting from pole position. Rubens Barrichello finished second in the other Brawn GP car, with Jarno Trulli third for Toyota.
